content.raw:
> or have ign-gazebo store the original sdf::Model element in a component that ign-gazebo can lookup later.

I think the main issue that prevented us from storing an `sdf::Model` in a component is that a lot of the SDF DOM objects did not have copy constructors and so it wasn't possible to create a copy of `sdf::Model` from children of `sdf::World`. I believe this is now [fixed](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/524/).
content.html:
or have ign-gazebo store the original sdf::Model element in a component that ign-gazebo can lookup later.

I think the main issue that prevented us from storing an sdf::Model in a component is that a lot of the SDF DOM objects did not have copy constructors and so it wasn't possible to create a copy of sdf::Model from children of sdf::World. I believe this is now fixed.
